successes.title: Sprout: HiFi Stereo Amp that transforms the way you listen
successes.description: Sprout asks only two questions: what do you want to listen to, and how loud?  We take care of the rest.

Pledges.description: You'll be included in our hearts, thoughts, and newsletter.  Together we bring more music to the world.
Be the first to bring the magic of Sprout into your home, hand-tested and signed by Scott! Save $400 from Sprout's $800 retail as thanks for your support!
Early adopters still get a smokin' hot deal! Save $350 from Sprout's $800 retail as thanks for your support!
With INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING ($75): first 200pcs ONLY.  Based on your region we will assign you either 120V or 230V.  Save $350 from Sprout's $800 retail as thanks for your support!
Let Sprout bring the magic of live music into your home! Save $300 from Sprout's $800 retail as thanks for your support!
With INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING ($75): Based on your region we will assign you either 120V or 230V.  Save $300 from Sprout's $800 retail as thanks for your support!
